alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing bond between a carbon atom and a lead atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organolead compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic salts containing a lead ion.
alternative_parents.name: Organic lead salts

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a chlorine ion.
alternative_parents.name: Organic chloride salts

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic salt compounds containing a metal atom in its ionic form.
class.name: Organic metal salts

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as organic metal halides. These are organic compounds containing metals and halogens. Some are ionic while others are covalently bonded.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing metals and halogens. Some are ionic while others are covalently bonded.
direct_parent.name: Organic metal halides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing metals and halogens. Some are ionic while others are covalently bonded.
subclass.name: Organic metal halides

superclass.description: Organic compounds consisting of an assembly of cations and anions.
superclass.name: Organic salts
